actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

actions.text: Reported to House by House Committee on Ways and Means.  Report No: 98-660.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to improve the administration of earnings test.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish procedures to avoid paying more than the correct amount of title II benefits to any individual as a result of such individual's failure to file a correct report or estimate of earnings or wages.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to improve the administration of earnings test.
